thread.title: Opposition slams Budget, Mamata calls it clueless
thread.title_full: Opposition slams Budget, Mamata calls it clueless

title: Opposition slams Budget, Mamata calls it clueless
text:
Union Budget 2017: Who said What Union Budget 2017: Who said What Feburary 01, 2017 1 /10 Narendra Modi, Prime Minister 
"This is a Budget for the future - for farmers, underprivileged, transparency, urban rejuvenation, rural development, enterprise. This Budget is yet again devoted to the well-being of the villages, farmers and the poor. From railway modernisation to economic reforms, from education to health, from entrepreneurship to industry, the aim at fulfilling the dreams of all is clearly visible in the Budget." (PTI photo) All Comments ()
